\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w line|strong="H2256"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w straitened|strong="H7114"\w*? \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w these|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*? \w Do|strong="H3190"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H3477"\w*?

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* women \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w ye|strong="H3947"\w* cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H8588"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*; \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* young \w children|strong="H5768"\w* \w ye|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w glory|strong="H1926"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
